item.title: Muhammad Shujaat Siddiqi: Basic Routing in ASP.NET Web API 2
item.description: NET Web API requests are specified in WebApiConfig. The route for the controller is specified as api/{Controller}. This is used to build routing table for Web API controllers. Using api should avoid any collision with ASP.NET MVC routes.
item.dc:creator: Muhammad Shujaat Siddiqi
